oai_dc:dc.dc:title: BioLexicon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The BioLexicon is a large-scale, wide-coverage computational lexicon covering the biomedical domain. A large part of the lexicon is concerned with covering biomedical terms and their variants. Entries for domain-specific verbs include syntactic and semantic information. The lexicon includes entries that correspond to biomedical-specific vocabulary, as well as general language words.
